name: Chance (SpaceMaks)
description:
Death is not an option, everyone has a chance for a good life.

Control:

Walk: LeftArrow(←), RightArrow(→).

Jump: Space.

Why do people play this game?

   After a few thousand years, humanity came to a rating system. The rating can go up or down depending on your actions.

   Not all people could put up with such a system.

   That's why most people have to play this game.

   In order not to exist on the verge of poverty and death, a person needs at least a rating of 15 for a good life. To get such a rating, a person needs to work for 5 years not at the best and not favorite job.

   Therefore, to speed up this process, people play such games.

   But not everyone gets out of poverty into a good life as quickly as they would like. For some, the game is addictive even for more than 5 years.

    But no one will ever reach the death rating ("0") in this game, so that every person should have a chance for a good existence.
